extensionAdditionalInfo.info: This extension contains actions for working with ComponentOne's Doc-To-Help.
extensionAdditionalInfo.actionInfo:
Builds a Doc-To-Help project.

Action Fields

Project File

The Doc-To-Help project file (.d2h) to build. This may be a path relative to the source directory or an absolute path. Note that the output directory is specified in the project and is generally also relative to the source directory.

Help Target

The name of the Doc-To-Help target to build. This should be the exact name of the help target as specified in the project. For example, NetHelp or HTMLHelp.
